net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy
Class AbstractTCPProxyEngine.OutputStreamFilterTee

java.lang.Object
  net.grinder.tools.tcpproxy.AbstractTCPProxyEngine.OutputStreamFilterTee
Enclosing class:
AbstractTCPProxyEngine
protected final class AbstractTCPProxyEngine.OutputStreamFilterTee
extends Object

Filter like class that delegates to a user filter and tees the result to an output stream. It is constructed for a particular connection. Also controls output of colour codes to the terminal.

Constructor Summary

          Constructor.
